items.name: Proton Pack
items.description: This is a Proton pack. Despite all it's damage and use it's never let you down.

items.name: Closet
items.description: This is a closet. Within it lies several stationaries and cobwebs.

items.name: Vacuum
items.description: This is an old vacuum. It's loud and clunky, you should really buy a new one.

items.name: First-Aid Kit
items.description: This is a First-Aid Kit. From bandages to medicine, this pack has everything you need

items.name: House Key
items.description: This is your house key. A keychain with the logo of the hit blockbuster movie 'Spook Chasers' hangs off the end.

items.name: Office Key
items.description: This is a key to your office. 'I <3 polymorphism' is engraved on the side.

items.name: Backpack
items.description: This is a backpack, it's old and big it looks like something is inside.....

items.name: Ghost Trap
items.description: This is a ghost trap. This old technology seems to be ancient. But it still does the trick!

items.name: Abandoned House Key
items.description: This is an Abandoned House Key. It seems much old and has rust on the edges.

items.name: Cosmic Proton Annihilator
items.description: This is a cosmic proton annihilator. The word cosmic is emblazed on the sides in a bright neon.

items.name: High-Frequency Ray Phaser
items.description: This is a High-Frequency Ray Phaser. It's dulled paint suggests heavy usage.

items.name: Blaster of Omega Multitude
items.description: This is the Blaster of Omega Magnitude. It's large body weighs down on your body. 'BOOM' is enscribed all over the weapon in black paint.

items.name: Proton Pistol
items.description: This is Proton Pistol. It's both small and deadly.

items.name: Bandage
items.description: This is a Bandage. It's gauze and fabric are more relaible than any modern medicine.

items.name: Healing Potion
items.description: This is a Healing Potion. You can depend on this trusty item when you are injured.
